Title: Nagano Toshi Gas x Kamiusagi Rope
Description: ['A collaboration between ', Kamiusagi Rope, ' and Nagano City Gas. The individual episodes were shown for 1 week on Nagano Broadcasting Systems official YouTube channel and website. Then later on the following Mezamashi Doyoubi (Saturday) broadcast.', ' ', ' ', ' ', " The goal was to inform people that Nagano City Gas' office has a wide variety of services such as a showroom showcasing remodeled gas kitchens, how to make sure you aren't losing money from bathroom heating, etc."]
